website_summaries.verdict: Good for ages 6 and up, this is a great, safe introduction to the water for your children.
pros: Made of tripe-layer heavy-gauge PVC and comes with an all-in-one filter pump and skimmer
The frame is galvanized steel tubing
Quick and easy to set up
cons: The pump that comes with it isn’t strong enough to keep the water clean
Think about getting another pump for it

customer_reviews.title: Great pool, easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Great pool, easy to set up!!! Just the right size to enjoy Texas summer!!! The most important: OUTSTANDING CUSTOMER SERVICE!!! Had a little issue and contacted them on a Saturday expecting to hear back only by Tuesday and surprise!! They wrote me back right away solving my problem. Very pleased with my purchase :D
customer_reviews.author: Ale

customer_reviews.title: Great Pool, Bad Pump
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome pool that is very sturdy and looks good. My 4 year old loves it and is able to stand up in it as its only 30" high. The only bad part? The pump is awful, i really dont think it does anything at all. I just use a pool skimmer to get stuff out as the pump wont do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Mukaking

customer_reviews.title: Pool has hole and not as tall as said
customer_reviews.text: Pool came with a puncture hole in it. Also I was told it is 36" deep and it is actually only 30" tall and can be filled up to about 25-26" with the filter. That's almost an entire foot shorter than what I was told.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Cook

customer_reviews.title: need to upgrade filter system pump
customer_reviews.text: Pool itself is great would have gave 5 stars. Filter system is junk. pump with filter in place might move 30 gph if that , with a new filter cartridge. Had to order new filter system to solve problem, only had 2 days and noticed the pump is junk, ordered an intex 1500 and fittings. Not recommend,, they need to upgrade pump
customer_reviews.author: Scott E Miller

customer_reviews.title: We got our money’s worth of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs and I just love i! I had to replace pump. I get lots of small holes in bottom of liner. I lined with black garbage bags to raise the temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Very study and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Great pool. Very study and easy to assemble. Only issue is that the filtration system is weak. Filter included can be rinsed out a few times. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Yelrabe

customer_reviews.title: Liner and frame are fine. Skimmer Motor didn’t last a summer - with care
customer_reviews.text: You know those reviews that say the skimmer/pump is terrible and breaks quickly? Believe them. It is not worth spit. The pool itself is fine, but the cheapest, junkiest motor possible on the skimmer. I never let the filter on this get near clogged, so the motor was not under ANY stress or strain. First time with this company. Wish Intex would make an 8 ft metal framed pool.
customer_reviews.author: J.A. Henson

customer_reviews.title: This 8' pool had held up great and has given hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: I've had several "tube top" pools. And none make it very long. THIS pool didn't take long to slap together and has held up through several storms and my 3 little monsters. I'd have purchased a larger one, but I didn't have the room. This 8' pool had held up great and has given hours of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Hrubec

customer_reviews.title: Love this pool!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I put it up late May since my gym pool was not opened. and I now go out and lay in the pool daily during the week. With a solar cover it totally heated up nicely and was very easy to put together. I am hoping that it will not be too difficult to take down at the end of the summer so that I can use it again next year. And I got it at a great price...before the vendors started gouging people...it is now going for upwards of $800..I got it for $200. Supply and demand.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pool!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded to this pool for past summer of 2019. We usually buy the easy set ones from Walmart with the inflated rings around the top, which ours got a hole somewhere in the ring that we could not find. This pool is much more sturdy, not difficult to set up. Just packed it up for the winter and stored in garage. Totally would recommend this one. Worth a few extra dollars.
customer_reviews.author: dags67

customer_reviews.title: Filter Headache
customer_reviews.text: The filters for the pathetic pump on this pool are NOT type D. I ordered them and they are waaaaay too big. Then I read more reviews and saw that it is actually a size 1 filter, not to be confused with the intex s1 filter.... Now the motor is making a noise after just 3 weeks of use that does not sound good. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: special needs mom

customer_reviews.title: If Only the filter held up
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated after reading reviews about the filter and the price seemed high compared to 10-foot pools, but I only had space for the 8-foot so I overpaid and took my chances. We've had this pool for over 3 weeks now and the filter stopped working yesterday. We purchased a cover at Big Lots so by keeping it covered when not in use the filter has not been a big necessity. The kids (6 and 8) love the pool and swim every day. I'd give it 5 stars all around if the filter had held up.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: Great pool for money.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, less than 30 mins. Great pool for the money. Found accessories to go with it. Perfect for kids, family, friends. 4-6 people comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: LRB

customer_reviews.title: It's size is actual
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, somewhat easy to put together. Filter is junk that comes with .really should buy better pump. Clips to put poles together we'll you will have terrible time undoing ,unless you plan to keep it up all year. A visit to home Depot to get another item will work . If you're short will need a little step.
customer_reviews.author: ruth sokolowski

customer_reviews.title: Our grandsons LOVE this pool
customer_reviews.text: Our grandsons LOVE this pool. Our son had it set up within an hour, and everything worked as advertised. Our only wish is that we had more space in the yard to fit a bigger version of this for even more fun. We did buy a separate pool ladder for easy entry and exit.
customer_reviews.author: AlisonA

customer_reviews.title: Great pool & easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install (took about an hour). The pool lining is very sturdy and mine did not have any holes on it. Fit my small backyard perfectly and my daughter has been enjoying daily.
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: N/a
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of the pool. When we received it it had 4 holes in it and had to patch the pool. . Because of the holes in the pool I give it 3 stars
customer_reviews.author: pozint

customer_reviews.title: Great little pool!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous pool! I got this just for my husband and I to cool off in every now and then. The pump does a pretty good job of keeping it clean. It really needs the next size up but it works fine. Be aware, Amazon does NOT sell the replacement filters for this pool. The ones they recommend are to big. Measure your filter before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Whatalady1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pool to Keep Cool!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second summer waves 8ft pool. I love it. When its 95 degrees and humid you will thank yourself. It definitely Does the job in those hot summer days and is quite refreshing . Where it sits is the only level area in my yard and it fits perfectly. YES you absolutely need to set it on a level surface. My filter pump works fine. I recommend not using an extension cord if at all possible. This pool is very low maintenance if you keep it clean and test your water regularly. Enjoy your summer and stay cool!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict💚

customer_reviews.title: Wrong type of filter listed in description. Type 1 filter not type D.
customer_reviews.text: It a good small pool for the kids. The skimmer/filter is a nice feature since kids are in and out. Seems to work well but the pump is too small for this unit. Also in the product description is states that the filter cartridge is a type D. IT IS NOT A TYPE D. IT IS A TYPE 1. Made the listing company aware of this major misprint. Dont know if they'll change it but I got them to credit the price of a 2pk of type 1 filters since i ordered type D as described.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy S.

customer_reviews.title: Great small pool
customer_reviews.text: Great small pool for kids or as an exercise pool which is how we use it. Filled to fill line is 27" deep. It was easy to assemble, the pump could have been better but it was adequate. We have enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Bellesmom

customer_reviews.title: This pool is so much better than the ones with the inflatable rings
customer_reviews.text: This pool is so much better than the ones with the inflatable rings. I wish the pump was a little stronger, but the kids love this pool
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little above ground pool for my 6 year old. We have used it every during the summer. It saved our pandemic summer! Only issue was that it was leaking around the filter. We tightened the filter and issue resolved. It was tricky finding where the water was leaking though. Super easy to assemble. Bought as a replacement for an inflatable that had started leaking air at a seam.
customer_reviews.author: cat fan

customer_reviews.title: The pump is not big enough.
customer_reviews.text: I would give a 5 stars except the pump is to small and it quit working in about 3 weeks. The pool it self is good for the price. We ordered a new pump and it seems to be much better.
customer_reviews.author: kay

customer_reviews.title: Pooooooool
customer_reviews.text: I’d give it 5 stars if it wasn’t for the pump. This pool is awesome, super easy to set up and pretty dang sturdy. It really is great for little ones or someone like myself who likes to relax alone and tan in a tube. Definitely recommend this pool minus the pump.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Hild

customer_reviews.title: Great pool for my 4 yr old..
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this pool.. I love that he can stand up and his head is way above water level.. I bought a intex 1500 gal/hr pump and adaptors for the hoses and connected it to the skimmer that came with the pool.. Filtration is amazing now..
customer_reviews.author: Brittney88

customer_reviews.title: Love the size
customer_reviews.text: I wish they had a better pump, but I do love the size of the pool.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal! Large enough for two adults to enjoy with kids. Had it up for a few weeks so far.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ertle

customer_reviews.title: Best small above ground pool we've owned!
customer_reviews.text: Held up through our four dogs that love to jump up on the side of the pool. With the inflatable ring pools we would have to replace it at least twice any given summer due to our dog's claws. This pool is a lifesaver! Both humans and fur babies alike enjoy cooling off in our pool.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Great. Easy set up. So far doing well. Have not yet attached the pump (no electricity in that part of garden) however it’s working well with chlorine ducks.
customer_reviews.author: TAMARA VARGAS

customer_reviews.title: Great pool
customer_reviews.text: The pump broke within a day. Customer service got me a new one quickly, very friendly.. however, the pump is grey and my old one was brown which matched the wicker style pool. Other than that the pool is great and my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Warren

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy different pump. One that comes with it wasn't strong enough to keep it clean.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Pump broke after 3 days
customer_reviews.text: Swimming pool itself is not bad. What broke after 3 uses is the pump. Not worthy to buy!
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids are having a ball!
customer_reviews.text: Everything needed to put thus together and keep it going is included. Went together in less than 30 min, filled in under 2 hours, kids were enjoying it in 2 hours and 5 min. Hard to get them out.Perfect pool for Ages 3 - 10 with supervision of course. Not too deep, not too big.
customer_reviews.author: Happylal

customer_reviews.title: Filter sucks
customer_reviews.text: The pool is great the filter sucks on my second filter and it also doesn't work apparently they are quite aware of the problem if their operators are an indication ( that's all they hear about all day)
customer_reviews.author: Irene Duffy

customer_reviews.title: 8×30 in pool, great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love that my 3yr old cant stand in the pool n have his head above the water but deep enough to have fun!! Pool is great size for my yard & family, the filter could use an upgrade cause it's not strong enough for the pool so thats my only complaint
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. We attempted take the pool apart with the idea to try to use it next year and they clearly make it so it's nearly impossible to take apart without breaking essential parts that keep it together. It also leaks in numerous locations. I would have left this product alone without a negative review however not being able to take it apart was the icing on the cake.
customer_reviews.author: Erica D Fishback

customer_reviews.title: Small filter
customer_reviews.text: This is a good size pool, but the size of the filter is too small therefore hard to keep pool clear!
customer_reviews.author: Irod

customer_reviews.title: Pump died after a week of setting it up
customer_reviews.text: Pump died after a week, I contacted seller he advised 24 48 hours they would respond and no response. Money wasted on pool, chemicals, and water.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: FAMILY FUN TIME
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS POOL! Highly recommend! Purchased 8ft pool. Perfect for 2 maybe even 3 people. Easy to maintain. Pump adequate for now. Will probably upgrade to stronger pump in the future.
customer_reviews.author: DrRD

customer_reviews.title: It should not leak
customer_reviews.text: It leaks in 3 place underneath in the seams and I have seen them a lot cheaper then what you charge me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell how good it is
customer_reviews.text: It seems ok, just put it up and filled it 3 days ago. It would have been easy to put together if the holes in the bars lined up better to put the pins thru. I can see already that it will bulge at the bottom from the water weight, will see in time how good it really is.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a small yard
customer_reviews.text: Great pool! Perfect for our whole family, with little yard space! We have a 2 and 6yr old, and the 2 yr old can even stand with her head above water, with a vest and supervision.... I can sit on the bottom and almost have my shoulders covered! Perfect to relax in on a hot summer day!
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Best $130 ever spent. My kids live in this pool!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle, Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! Perfect for toddlers or kids. My daughter only 2 yr old and she can stand in it and she has so much fun.
customer_reviews.author: Maryland Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Pool is great , pump is cheap !!
customer_reviews.text: The pump isn’t of good quality. We received the pool a day early . Was very easy to assemble. Used it 2 days and the pump stopped working. We have had to order a more expensive pump . However , we do like the pool but be prepared to purchase a better pump .
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa D

customer_reviews.title: Loving summer 2019!
customer_reviews.text: During the second week the pump stopped working but Amazon and the manufacturer were just amazing. Contacted me immediately and fixed the problem right away. Family and I LOVE the pool!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Angustain

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: I would have give it a five stars but the pump don’t work. Just need a better pump to keep pool clean.
customer_reviews.author: chuong

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: It will be a few years until we will be able to put an in ground pool in so in the meantime this pool works great. You have to immediately upgrade the pump but after that smooth sailing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pump is useless
customer_reviews.text: Great little pool for the grandkids, the pump is useless though.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Smith

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price saves water over inflatable  soft pools.
customer_reviews.text: The pump is a bit weak for my liking. My kid has no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Product not delivered as represented
customer_reviews.text: The seller knowingly sold at full price and shipped the above ground pool without the liner so it cannot be used. Their answer was that they do not have any more liners. This is gross misrepresentation at best
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pumpnis garbage
customer_reviews.text: The pump it comes with is weak I had to upgrade to a bigger one which was $200
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Filter pump to weak.
customer_reviews.text: The filter pump is a little weak. Needs more power.
customer_reviews.author: Ken w.

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for making memories
customer_reviews.text: Our family is enjoying this product very much. We can float and relax. It was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Pump is no good!
customer_reviews.text: The pool is awesome and easy to set up. The pump stopped working on the 2nd day !!!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Soto

customer_reviews.title: Above expectations
customer_reviews.text: Above expectations, very strong easy to assembly product. Honestly more than what we were expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the money it should last longer than a month
customer_reviews.text: It’s a month old and it rippped out over night. It’s used by adults. No kids. Wth
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid, avoid, avoid
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk.. total rip off! Leaked within a month of putting up...
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for the Lil’s.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 5 yr old and friends to play in.
customer_reviews.author: karen e jones

customer_reviews.title: Very good pool🤣
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pool very easy to set up looks good, holds very good no issue what so ever
customer_reviews.author: ifahs

customer_reviews.title: Mini Pool
customer_reviews.text: It’s a miniature swimming pool! Great for kids. My grandchildren don’t want to come out of it and it doesn’t take up much room.
customer_reviews.author: RANDY L MALDONADO

product_meta.title: Summer Waves Active 8ft x 30in Round Frame Above Ground Outdoor Swimming Pool with Filter Pump
feature_bullets: FAMILY SIZED POOL WITH STYLISH EXTERIOR: Splash the day away in the comfort and privacy of your own backyard with this above ground frame pool
SIZE: 8 foot diameter and 30 inch deep metal frame pool with included filter system with a 801 gallon capacity
QUALITY: Durable metal frame stands up to heavy use and the elements
ASSEMBLY & USE: Ready for water in as little as 30 minutes and is recommended for ages 6+
WHAT'S INCLUDED: Includes RX330 Pump with GFCI and D type filter cartridge

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars180 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
